title_summ: Author Correction: Vitamin lipid nanoparticles enable adoptive macrophage transfer for the treatment of multidrug-resistant bacterial sepsis.Immune response in children with COVID-19 is characterized by lower levels of T cell activation than infected adults.Correction to: COVID-19 and heme oxygenase: novel insight into the disease and potential therapies
